DropshipOrder.title: OrderFull (Object) Required
DropshipOrder.description: Instead of creating an Order and then adding Items to the Order one at a time, this request can be used to create an Order with Items all at once. Note An OrderFull can only be updated in the Pending or Created state.

OrderTypeId.title: OrderTypeId (Integer) Required
OrderTypeId.description: See OrderType for a list of acceptable values.

BillingAddressId.title: BillingAddressId (GUID) Optional
BillingAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the billing Address.

BillingCustomerId.title: BillingCustomerId (GUID) Optional
BillingCustomerId.description: Unique identifier for the billing Customer. Must belong to the Company specified in the URI. Required to Process an Order.

DiscountAmount.title: DiscountAmount (Decimal) Optional
DiscountAmount.description: The value of the discount to be applied at the Order level.

DiscountCode.title: DiscountCode (String) Optional
DiscountCode.description: The discount code for a discount applied to this Order.

EmployeeId.title: EmployeeId (Integer) Optional
EmployeeId.description: Identifier for the Employee who created this Order. Must belong to the Company specified in the URI.

OrderExpiryHours.title: OrderExpiryHours (Integer) Optional
OrderExpiryHours.description: The amount of hours before this Order expires and can no longer be updated. Defaults to 72 hours.

ShippingAddressId.title: ShippingAddressId (GUID) Optional
ShippingAddressId.description: Unique identifier for the shipping Address.

ShippingCustomerId.title: ShippingCustomerId (GUID) Optional
ShippingCustomerId.description: Unique identifier for the shipping Customer. If this value is provided, ShippingEntityId must be excluded.

ShippingEntityId.title: ShippingEntityId (Integer) Optional
ShippingEntityId.description: Identifier for the Location this Order will be shipped to. If this value is provided, ShippingCustomerId must be excluded.

State.title: State (String) Optional
State.description: If not provided, this value will be generated. State can be changed using this field. See OrderState for a list of acceptable values and Overview for legal state transitions.

TenderId.title: TenderId (String) Optional
TenderId.description: An invoice number from the system that created the Order, Invoice Number in RQ.

DateCreatedUtc.title: DateCreatedUtc (DateTime) Required
DateCreatedUtc.description: An ISO 8601 UTC timestamp indicating when the sales order was created.

LocationId.title: LocationId (Integer) Required
LocationId.description: The identifier of the company Location generating the sales order.

CustomerId.title: CustomerId (GUID) Required
CustomerId.description: The identifier of the Customer making the purchase.

ExpiryDateUtc.title: ExpiryDateUtc (String) Optional
ExpiryDateUtc.description: An ISO 8601 UTC timestamp indicating when the sales order should expire. If not set, RQ’s default expiry date algorithm is used. Note that the expiration of this date does not trigger any event in RQ; instead, this property can be used with your own business processes to determine when to expire sales orders.

Items.title: Items (Array[SaleOrderItem]) Required
Items.description: The items in the sales order. There must be at least one item in the order.

LineNumber.title: LineNumber (Integer) Required
LineNumber.description: The line number of the item. An incrementable integer greater than one. Must be unique within the sales order.

ProductCatalogId.title: ProductCatalogId (GUID) Required
ProductCatalogId.description: The identifier of the CatalogItem in the iQmetrix Product Library. To obtain a complete list of catalog IDs, see Get All Catalog Items

Quantity.title: Quantity (Integer) Required
Quantity.description: The number of items of this type in the order.

PricingTermId.title: PricingTermId (Integer) Optional
PricingTermId.description: The identifier of a PricingTerm in RQ. For a complete list of pricing terms, see Get All Active Pricing Terms.

ItemType.title: ItemType (String) Required
ItemType.description: The item type. Supported values are InStock (the item is in stock) or Dropship (the item is available to be drop.

CorrelationId.title: CorrelationId (String) Required
CorrelationId.description: An identifier that can be used to correlate the item to an identifier in an external system.

SupplierEntityId.title: SupplierEntityId (Integer) Required
SupplierEntityId.description: When the item type is Dropship, either DropshipOrderId or SupplierEntityId must be provided. Forbidden otherwise. For Dropship item types, the SupplierEntityId associated with the product.

SerialNumber.title: SerialNumber (String) Required
SerialNumber.description: Required for serialized products where the quantity is 1 or -1

TaxLineItems.title: TaxLineItems (Array[TaxLineItem]) Required
TaxLineItems.description: A list of taxes associated with all or parts of this sales order. Either all of TaxName, TaxableAmount, Rate, and Tax must be supplied, or else IqmetrixTaxServiceId, but not both.

items.title: TaxLineItem
items.description: A tax line item which corresponds to a line item on the sales order. Either full tax information is provided (all of TaxName, TaxableAmount, Rate, and Tax) or a reference to a tax query in the iQmetrix tax service (IqTaxServiceId), but not both.

TaxName.title: TaxName (String) Required
TaxName.description: Required if IqmetrixTaxServiceId is not specified, forbidden otherwise. The name of the tax being applied.

TaxableAmount.title: TaxableAmount (Decimal) Required
TaxableAmount.description: Required if IqmetrixTaxServiceId is not specified, forbidden otherwise.The taxable amount.

Rate.title: Rate (Decimal) Required
Rate.description: Required if IqmetrixTaxServiceId is not specified, forbidden otherwise. The effective tax rate.

Tax.title: Tax (Decimal) Required
Tax.description: Required if IqmetrixTaxServiceId is not specified, forbidden otherwise. The amount of tax charged.

IqmetrixTaxServiceId.title: IqmetrixTaxServiceId (GUID) Required
IqmetrixTaxServiceId.description: Required if TaxName, TaxableAmount, Rate, and Tax are specified, forbidden if they are. The identifier of a tax query in the iQmetrix tax service.

Payments.title: Payments (Array[Payment]) Required
Payments.description: An array of objects representing any payments that have been made on the order. The array is required, but can be empty if there are no payments.

AuthCode.title: AuthCode (String) Optional
AuthCode.description: The authorization code for the payment.

TransactionNumber.title: TransactionNumber (String) Optional
TransactionNumber.description: The transaction number of the payment.

Token.title: Token (String) Optional
Token.description: The token associated with the payment.

CorrelationId.title: CorrelationId (String) Optional
CorrelationId.description: Correlates this payment with a payment record in another system. Although the Sales Order Service retains the full string, the string is trimmed to 30 characters when submitted to RQ.

TaxCalculationResultId.title: TaxCalculationResultId (GUID) Required
TaxCalculationResultId.description: The identifier of a tax calculation returned by the IQ Tax Service.

BillingAddressId.title: BillingAddressId (GUID) Optional
BillingAddressId.description: The identifier of a customer billing Address. In the future, this address must exist in the CRM service. Currently, it is not validated.

ShippingAddressId.title: ShippingAddressId (GUID) Optional
ShippingAddressId.description: The identifier of a customer shipping Address. In the future, this address must exist in the CRM service. Currently, it is not validated.

PrintableId.title: PrintableId (String) Required
PrintableId.description: An identifier from the external system that can be used to reference the order; for example, the online order confirmation number. This identifier is mentioned in the comments section of the sales order and the invoices. Maximum 50 characters.

DropshipOrderId.title: DropshipOrderId (GUID) Required
DropshipOrderId.description: When the item type is Dropship, either DropshipOrderId or SupplierEntityId must be provided. Forbidden otherwise. The identifier for this order in the Order service.

UserId.title: UserId (Integer) Optional
UserId.description: The identifier of a valid User in RQ. This user must have sufficient permissions to create sales orders, add products, and create invoices at this location.

ShippingLineItems.title: ShippingLineItems (Array[ShippingLineItem]) Optional
ShippingLineItems.description: A list of shipping line items associated with all or parts of this sales order.

LineNumber.title: LineNumber (Integer) Optional
LineNumber.description: The line number of the shipping item. An incrementable integer greater than one. Must be unique within the list of shipping items.

CorrelationId.title: CorrelationId (String) Optional
CorrelationId.description: An identifier that can be used to correlate this shipping information with shipping information in another system.

RetailerCatalogId.title: RetailerCatalogId (GUID) Optional
RetailerCatalogId.description: The identifier of the CatalogItem in the retailer’s catalog.

AssociatedLineItems.title: AssociatedLineItems (Array[integer]) Optional
AssociatedLineItems.description: The LineItem number(s) of the sales order item(s) being shipped using this shipping line item.

DiscountLineItems.title: DiscountLineItems (Array[DiscountLineItem]) Optional
DiscountLineItems.description: A list of discount line items associated with all or parts of this sales order.

LineNumber.title: LineNumber (Integer) Optional
LineNumber.description: The line number of the discount item. An incrementable integer greater than one. Must be unique within the list of discount items.

Amount.title: Amount (Decimal) Optional
Amount.description: The amount the item has been discounted.

Name.title: Name (String) Optional
Name.description: The name of the discount being applied.

DiscountCode.title: DiscountCode (String) Optional
DiscountCode.description: The code for the discount being applied.

AssociatedLineItems.title: AssociatedLineItems (Array[integer]) Optional
AssociatedLineItems.description: The LineItem number(s), if any, of the sales order item(s) being discounted using this discount.

RetailerCatalogId.title: RetailerCatalogId (GUID) Optional
RetailerCatalogId.description: The identifier of the CatalogItem in the retailer’s catalog.

Customer.title: CustomerFull (Object) Required
Customer.description: A CustomerFull record includes all the information captured for a given customer. POSTing a CustomerFull record provides an easy way of specifying all related information for a customer at once. Note that PUT is not supported on CustomerFull resources (for example, to update an address). To modify a customer record, PUT to the endpoint of the constituent resource (for example, the Address resource).

CustomerTypeId.title: CustomerTypeId (Integer) Required
CustomerTypeId.description: The code for the customer type. For supported values, see CustomerTypeId.

PrimaryName.title: PrimaryName (String) Optional
PrimaryName.description: For a person, the first or given name. For an organization, business, or division, the full name.

FamilyName.title: FamilyName (String) Optional
FamilyName.description: The customer’s surname or last name.

AlternateName.title: AlternateName (String) Optional
AlternateName.description: The alias or preferred name for the customer.

Title.title: Title (String) Optional
Title.description: The title to be used in customer salutations.

DateOfBirth.title: DateOfBirth (DateTime) Optional
DateOfBirth.description: The customer’s birth date, in UTC. You can use a full timestamp or shortened form (yyyy-mm-dd).

Disabled.title: Disabled (Boolean) Optional
Disabled.description: A flag indicating whether or not this customer is disabled. Deleting a customer is interpreted as a Disable operation, as a customer record cannot be fully deleted. The default is false. When the Disabled flag is set to true, the customer can still be retrieved and updated normally.

DoNotContact.title: DoNotContact (Boolean) Optional
DoNotContact.description: A flag indicating this customer is private; that is, it is not to be used by external systems (such as a marketing system). If not provided when the record is created, this field is set to true.

Notes.title: Notes (String) Optional
Notes.description: Any notes related to this customer.

Addresses.title: Addresses (Array[Address]) Optional
Addresses.description: The Address resource in CustomerFull records is as for other cases, except that CustomerId is not specified.

ContactMethods.title: ContactMethods (Array[ContactMethod]) Optional
ContactMethods.description: The ContactMethod resource for CustomerFull records is as in other cases, except that CustomerId is not specified.

Address.title: Address (Object)
Address.description: The Address resource records information for a single customer address. You can define multiple addresses for a customer.

CustomerId.title: CustomerId (GUID) Required on update only
CustomerId.description: The identifier of the Customer associated with this address.

AddressTypeId.title: AddressTypeId (Integer) Required
AddressTypeId.description: The code for the address type. For supported values, see AddressTypeId.

CountryCode.title: CountryCode (String) Required
CountryCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 alpha-2 code for the country where this address is located. To see the list of these codes, see Getting All Countries.

StateCode.title: StateCode (String) Required
StateCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 alpha-2 Region code for the state or province where this address resides. To see a list of these codes, see Getting All Countries. The state code must actually belong to the specified country.

AttentionTo.title: AttentionTo (String) Optional
AttentionTo.description: The name of the person or department residing at this address.

Default.title: Default (Boolean) Optional
Default.description: A flag indicating whether this address is the default address for the customer.

DoNotContact.title: DoNotContact (Boolean) Optional
DoNotContact.description: A flag indicating whether this address is private and not to be used by any external systems (such as a marketing system). If not provided when the record is created, this field is set to true.

Email.title: Email (String) Optional
Email.description: The contact email for this address. If provided, the format of the address must be valid.

Locality.title: Locality (String) Optional
Locality.description: The locality (for example, city, town, or hamlet) of this address.

Notes.title: Notes (String) Optional
Notes.description: Any notes related to this address.

Phone.title: Phone (String) Optional
Phone.description: The contact phone number for this address.

PostalCode.title: PostalCode (String) Optional
PostalCode.description: The postal code/zip code for this address.

PostOfficeBoxNumber.title: PostOfficeBoxNumber (String) Optional
PostOfficeBoxNumber.description: The post office box number for this address.

ContactMethod.title: ContactMethod (Object)
ContactMethod.description: A ContactMethod resource records the information for contacting a customer. You can define multiple contact methods for a customer.

Id.title: Id (GUID) Required on update only
Id.description: The identifier of the contact method.

CustomerId.title: CustomerId (GUID) Required on update only
CustomerId.description: The identifier of the Customer associated with the contact method.

ContactMethodCategoryId.title: ContactMethodCategoryId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodCategoryId.description: The numeric code for the contact method category. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodTypeId.title: ContactMethodTypeId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodTypeId.description: The code representing the contact method type. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

Default.title: Default (Boolean) Optional
Default.description: A flag indicating whether this is the default contact method for the customer.

DoNotContact.title: DoNotContact (Boolean) Optional
DoNotContact.description: A flag indicating this customer is private; that is, it is not to be used by external systems (such as a marketing system). If not provided when the record is created, this field is set to true.

Notes.title: Notes (String) Optional
Notes.description: Notes related to this contact method.

Value.title: Value (String) Optional
Value.description: The information for that contact method: for example, the actual email address or phone number. Email addresses are validated (but not verified).

ContactMethodCategoryId.title: ContactMethodCategoryId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodCategoryId.description: The numeric code for the contact method category. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodTypeId.title: ContactMethodTypeId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodTypeId.description: The code representing the contact method type. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodCategoryId.title: ContactMethodCategoryId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodCategoryId.description: The numeric code for the contact method category. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodTypeId.title: ContactMethodTypeId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodTypeId.description: The code representing the contact method type. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

Value.title: Value (String) Optional
Value.description: The information for that contact method: for example, the actual email address or phone number. Email addresses are validated (but not verified).

ContactMethodCategoryId.title: ContactMethodCategoryId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodCategoryId.description: The numeric code for the contact method category. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

ContactMethodTypeId.title: ContactMethodTypeId (Integer) Required
ContactMethodTypeId.description: The code representing the contact method type. For a list of supported types and categories, see ContactMethod Types and Categories.

CustomerExtension.title: CustomerExtension (Object)
CustomerExtension.description: A CustomerExtension resource sets the value for an extension (CustomerExtensionType) for a given customer.

CustomerId.title: CustomerId (GUID) Required on update and standalone insert

ExtensionTypeId.title: ExtensionTypeId (Integer) Required
ExtensionTypeId.description: The identifier of the extension type. For supported values, see ExtensionTypeId.

Value.title: Value (String) Optional
Value.description: The new value for the custom property.

Cost.title: Cost (Decimal) Optional
Cost.description: Cost the retailer paid for the product, defaults to 0.

Index.title: Index (Integer) Optional
Index.description: A value used for sorting Items, such as in a shopping cart.

ListPrice.title: ListPrice (Decimal) Optional
ListPrice.description: Price retailer is selling the product for (could be regular or sale price). Defaults to 0.

ProductId.title: ProductId (String) Optional
ProductId.description: Identifier for a CatalogItem, if provided must be unique for each Item on the Order.

Quantity.title: Quantity (Integer) Optional
Quantity.description: Amount of this Item In Stock, defaults to 0.

SellingPrice.title: SellingPrice (Decimal) Optional
SellingPrice.description: The price the item was actually sold for, defaults to 0.

SerialNumbers.title: SerialNumbers (Array[string]) Optional
SerialNumbers.description: Serial numbers intended for product serialization.

ShippingOptionId.title: ShippingOptionId (String) Optional
ShippingOptionId.description: Identifier for the ShippingOption that this Item will use.

SupplierEntityId.title: SupplierEntityId (Integer) Optional
SupplierEntityId.description: Identifier for the Supplier of this Item.

SupplierReference.title: SupplierReference (String) Optional
SupplierReference.description: May be used for additional Supplier reference information.

TrackingInformation.title: TrackingInformation (Array[object]) Optional
TrackingInformation.description: Tracking information in the form of key-value pairs.
